      public RainbowGum.Builder route(String name, Consumer<LogRouter.Router.Builder> consumer)
      Adds a route by using a consumer of the route builder.
      Parameters:
      name - name of router.
      consumer - consumer is passed router builder. The consumer does not need to call LogRouter.Router.builder(String,LogConfig)
      Returns:
      builder.

    • set

      public RainbowGum set()
      Builds, starts and sets the RainbowGum as the global one picked up by logging facades.
      Returns:
      started and set rainbow that can be used in a try-close.

    • optional

      public Optional<RainbowGum> optional()
      For returning an optional for the LogProvider contract.
      Returns:
      optional that always has a rainbow gum.
      API Note
      this method is for ergonomics.

    • optional

      public Optional<RainbowGum> optional(Function<? super LogConfig,Boolean> condition)
      For returning an optional for the LogProvider contract.
      Parameters:
      condition - condition to check if this rainbow gum should be used.
      Returns:
      optional rainbow gum.
      API Note
      this method is for ergonomics.
